data.title: Super Mario 64 Engine
data.meta_description: The engine of Super Mario 64 is responsible for handling the 3D world of some of the most influential Nintendo 64 games. It was heavily altered for use with the two Nintendo 64 Zeldas and also for...
data.text: The engine of Super Mario 64 is responsible for handling the 3D world of some of the most influential Nintendo 64 games. It was heavily altered for use with the two Nintendo 64 Zeldas and also for the game Animal Forest (Animal Crossing).
